paper_abstract: We consider a specific type of singularities for kinematic chains, so-called point singularities. These were characterized in 2005 by Borcea and Streinu. We give a new proof for this result in the framework of the Exterior Algebra. As an illustration we give an exhaustive list of the point singularities of a specific robot manipulator.
paper_title: A Short Note on Point Singularities for Robot Manipulators
